name: Card.Section
description: Inner component for rendering content easily inside a Card component

props.name: content
props.description: Text content. Example: content={[{text: 'Youâ€™re Invited!', text70: true, grey10: true}]}

props.name: leadingIcon
props.description: Image props for a leading icon to render before the text

props.name: trailingIcon
props.description: Image props for a trailing icon to render after the text

props.name: imageSource
props.description: Will be used for the background when provided

props.name: imageStyle
props.description: The style for the background image

props.name: imageProps
props.description: Other image props that will be passed to the image
